channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: South Korea passes cryptocurrency bill to tackle unfair trading
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: South Korea’s crypto bill aims to establish a basis for imposing penalties and liability for damages caused by unfair cryptocurrency trading.

item.title: What are blue-chip NFTs, and how can we find them?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Onkar Singh
item.description: Blue-chip NFTs refer to highly valuable and prestigious nonfungible tokens that are considered top-tier assets within the NFT market.

item.title: US senator pushes tech companies to label AI-generated content
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: United States Senator Michael Bennet wrote a letter to major tech companies, including OpenAI and Google, to urge the labeling of AI-generated content.

item.title: Bitcoin price briefly clears $31K as monthly, quarterly close nears
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin tries to cement higher support as an important day for markets arrives.

item.title: Forget about price! Polkadot Decoded 2023 says bear markets are for building
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ray Salmond
item.description: The mantra of this year’s Polkadot Decoded 2023 conference is to focus on building better products instead of worrying about token price.

item.title: Blockchain Australia CEO calls for unified efforts to stamp out crypto scams
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Simon Callaghan said that efforts need to start on social media and telecommunication channels where most cryptocurrency scams originate.

item.title: Federal Reserve’s banking bailouts reach a new weekly high of $103B
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The Fed’s emergency loan facility has reached new highs as embattled banks are needing a central bank bailout.

item.title: Crypto ‘regulatory approach isn’t needed now’ — New Zealand central bank
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: However, the Reserve Bank of New Zealand also said that crypto and stablecoins should be more closely monitored.

item.title: CBDCs aren’t about solving today’s problems — Australia’s CBDC lead
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Dilip Rao, a former Ripple executive who’s now leading Australia’s CBDC pilot, has been examining 14 possible use cases of central bank digital currencies.

item.title: Coinbase layer-2 network Base closes in on mainnet launch
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: While a date for mainnet wasn’t announced, the Base team said it’s now fulfilled four out of five of their criteria for launch.

item.title: Crypto offers Africans a ‘lifeline’ from inflation and corruption, say execs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Chris Maurice, founder and CEO of crypto exchange Yellow Card said in Africa, crypto isn’t the “casino” it can sometimes feel like in the West.

item.title: U.S. House committee chairs, Blockchain Association turn up heat on SEC head Gensler
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Three House chairs sent a letter regarding recordkeeping and FOIA, and the industry advocacy group suggested Wells notice recipients ask for his recusal from their cases.

item.title: Fidelity renews push for spot Wise Origin BTC Trust, making it 7th applicant this year
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The huge asset manager was denied approval for the Wise Origin Trust last year; now, it is joining a long line of spot fund hopefuls.

item.title: 'Sam Bankman-Fried really hurt the industry' — Anthony Scaramucci
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The politician and business magnate has his eyes set on Binance CEO CZ taking the reins of the future crypto industry.

item.title: CME Group set to introduce ETH to BTC Ratio futures
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The scheduled launch date for these futures contracts is set for July 31, pending regulatory review.

item.title: UK crypto bill reaches final stage, on track for passage
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The legislation now waits on King Charles’ table for royal assent, the final step required for a parliamentary bill to become law.

item.title: LayerZero’s market shifting, there’s a better environment ahead for everyone, CEO says
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: LayerZero CEO Bryan Pellegrino is optimistic about the future of the blockchain industry and the “really important plumbing” LayerZero provides for it.

item.title: Inflection AI raises $1.3B in funding led by Microsoft and Nvidia
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The company has raised $1.525 billion in funding since its inception last year.

item.title: How to start a career in artificial intelligence
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Guneet Kaur
item.description: Discover how to kickstart a career in AI by building a strong foundation through AI courses, gaining practical experience with projects and more!

item.title: Solana’s Cardinal shuts down, citing economic conditions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: According to the protocol’s closing schedule, part of the operations will cease on July 19, while the withdrawal period ends on Aug. 26.

item.title: The SEC is targeting Coinbase, Binance as proxies in its war on crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Trevor Ward
item.description: SEC Chair Gary Gensler’s lawsuits against Coinbase and Binance are a turning point for crypto — and an opportunity to fight back.

item.title: Bitcoin traders say BTC price will soon break beyond $31K yearly highs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price sideways trading is not dampening the optimism of Bitcoin traders prior to a giant options open interest expiry.

item.title: 9 key steps for ensuring compliance with incoming MiCA regulations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Crypto companies operating in the EU must begin work now to comply with MiCA and assess how it might affect their global operations.

item.title: AI Eye: AI travel booking hilariously bad, 3 weird uses for ChatGPT, crypto plugins
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Fenton
item.description: ChatGPT and Bard can help you book fictional hotels and awful 29-hour flights, 3 bizarre uses for AI, and do crypto plugins actually work?

item.title: Bitcoin options: How will Friday’s $4.7B expiry impact BTC price?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Bitcoin ETF requests, miners’ sell pressure, and regulatory hurdles create uncertainty for the $31,000 BTC price resistance.

item.title: Coinbase seeks dismissal of SEC suit, claims extraordinary abuse of process
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The motion to dismiss argues that even if all the allegations in the lawsuit are true, the plaintiff does not have a valid legal claim.

item.title: What is an atomic swap, and how does it work?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shailey Singh
item.description: Exchange cryptocurrency securely on different blockchains using atomic swaps. It’s either a swap or a no-swap, ensuring crypto funds’ security.

item.title: Bitcoin salary: Employees choose crypto paychecks amid economic instability
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Volatility among some fiat currencies has made stablecoins like USDC a more attractive option for payroll, according to HR executives.

item.title: Canadian committee proposes measures to support blockchain, crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The report, which consists of 16 separate proposals, highlights the advantages and potential of blockchain technology in various sectors.

item.title: Slovakian parliament votes to approve lower crypto taxes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: A parliamentary vote held by lawmakers in Slovakia approved an amendment that will reduce the taxation of cryptocurrencies, which is currently on a sliding scale.
